The back of strong magnetic indicator is covered with soft silicone to protect your dishwasher or washing machine.

RUSTIC FARMHOUSE WOOD DESIGN: 3D Wood Rustic Farm Style clean or dirty dishwasher sign is practical and fun as kitchen decor to have in your home. Sometime we need to say no to the annoying dirty . Making it a creative gift for family.

UPGRADED ANTI-ERROR SLIDING DESIGN: For the great customer experience, dirty clean dishwasher magnet has found the perfect balance to hold the slider in place while easily sliding the label to indicate Clean or Dirty. Easy to use, smooth sliding without obstruction.

WORK WITH ANY DISHWASHER：Oxepleus dishwasher magnet clean dirty comes with two extra double-sided self-adhesive stickers to stick on any non magnetic dishwasher. This Stickers is optional and used for non-magnetic surfaces. Stays put for years.Dishwasher clean dirty magnet sign can also works well for washing machines or dryers in the laundry room.

GREAT FAMILY GADGET GIFT: You can buy a dishwasher clean dirty sign for your mother, wife, grandparents, best friend and even your children. This dirty clean magnet will be a sweet family gadget gift, which can help you keep the kitchen clean and cultivate your children's habit of doing housework and responsibility!

CUSTOMER DRIVEN : Oxepleus strive to create dishwasher sign that customers are not only happy to buy, but also satisfied to own. If you aren’t satisfied with your purchase, simply return it for a full refund.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: "ARE THE DISHES DIRTY OR CLEAN?" -- Now, we can stop guessing game. -- Clean dirty sign for dishwasher gives you husband and children NO EXCUSES! They'll always know whether the dishwasher is clean or dirty! This funny dishwasher sign clean dirty is a great reminder or helper to determine if the dishes are ready to load or unload without having to open them. Makes a great home organization gift idea for those that can't seem to remember, or those that live a busy life and just don't have the time. Here are 5 reasons why you're going to choose Oxepleus clean/dirty dishwasher magnet: -7 x 2 inch design is easy to see from anywhere in your kitchen to eliminate guessing and improve kitchen storage and organization.-The sharp contrast color makes it easy to identify CLEAN and DIRTY. Even young kids can easily read .-Upgrated strong magnet. Won't scratch surfaces, perfect if you want your magnet flat against any surface.-Work with Any Dishwasher. Our clean dirty dishwasher magnet comes with double-sided adhesive stickers to stick on any non magnetic dishwasher. Clean dishes dirty dishes magnet can also works well for washing machines or dryers in the laundry room.-Great Family Gadget Gift. This dirty clean sign for dishwasher will be a sweet family gadget gift, which can help you keep the kitchen clean and cultivate your children's habit of doing housework and responsibility! Included in the Package: 1 x Dishwasher dirty clean magnet 2 x Double-sided adhesive stickers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly We Needed, So Cute!
reviews.reviewText: The magnet is strong so it doesn’t easily slide around or get bumped out of place. The text is a tasteful, easy to read font. The sliding door is super simple to use and oddly satisfying. We’ve received compliments on it and we couldn’t be happier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So simple and very useful
reviews.reviewText: We had a recurring issue where 3 of 4 members of the household were seemingly unable to identify whether the dishwasher had clean or dirty dishes. The tiny "clean" light on my dishwasher should have been a clue to those who looked for it, but it would often get turned off without 3 of 4 members of the household actually emptying the dishwasher.I wanted something that was can't-miss-it readable, easy to use, and still looked decent on my fancy stainless dishwasher. This little magnet has been perfect. It looks quite nice and the is close enough to the steel look that it blends quite nicely. It looks like it belongs there. The clean/dirty signs being black/white make them very visible without being too garish. The magnet has been sturdy enough to keep the sign in place throughout daily opening/closing of the door. The cover slides easily and stays in place.When I start the dishwasher, I slide the door to show CLEAN. After I empty the dishwasher, I slide it back to show DIRTY. I have seen a definite decline in dirty dishes being left in the sink and, when it does happen, there is no more "I didn't know!" excuse option. The 3 problem members of the household have actually each expressed how handy the magnet has been.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like that it didn't look cheap or cheesy, like something from the dollar store. It fit very well with my decor and helps keep track of clean/dirty dishes. Perfect for what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Strong magnet, doesn’t slide around. Easily slides between clean and dirty but not so easily that it won’t stay in place. Clean look

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nicely done, sturdy and good material. Great value for the price. I recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Larger letters than expected
reviews.reviewText: I like it and works great with a nice magnet that doesn’t move all over the place like some. My only wish is that the lettering was a bit smaller / more crisp - that’s why my 4/5 star rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why'd we wait so long!!!
reviews.reviewText: We love this. If you're reading this you have the same problem my family used to have, mom, are these clean? Once I started putting them away before I realized they were dirty!It looks like it was with the dishwasher all along. My husband put it on and picked the perfect spot, but it could go anywhere you want it. No installation, the magnet worked on ours. Easy to move if we ever wanted to. The slide is super easy to slide and very easy to read. One last hassle we no longer have to deal with. Super happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really happy with this
reviews.reviewText: This item is great. It slides nicely. It helps us determine if the dishes are clean or dirty. It stays in place nicely and doesn't move. Nice quality and nice size. I'm happy with this purchase.
